definition: to remain silent/to have nothing to say/(coll.) speechless/dumbfounded

sentences.english: Feelings are like waters, the shallow murmurs, but the deep are dumb.
sentences.chinese: 感情如流水，淺處淙淙有聲，深處默默無語。

sentences.english: Often as they all sat together every one was silent.
sentences.chinese: 他們都坐在一起，常常默默無語。

sentences.english: And just that left me speechless, really.
No comment. I'm not going to say anything.
But that scares her, at least when she tries it.
sentences.chinese: 但這讓她很無語，至少是當她也嘗試這樣寫歌時。

sentences.english: Then tears started to stream down their cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 兩個人沉默無語，眼淚流滿了臉頰。

sentences.english: Outdoor Advertising has always been show person with the image but quietly silent, so they are unable to interact.
sentences.chinese: 戶外廣告一直是以形象示人但默默無語，無法互動。

sentences.english: People just started gloomily into the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 人們只是默默無語地看着鏡子。

sentences.english: Therefore, most of the time, I want to say speechless, ultimately chose silence.
sentences.chinese: 所以，多半時候，我欲言無語，最終選擇了沉默。

sentences.english: He was silent for a while, and so was I.
sentences.chinese: 說到這裏他沉默了一會，我也一時無語。
但是，愷低着頭，默默無語。

sentences.english: The injured captain, lying in the bow of the boat, said nothing.
sentences.chinese: 受傷的船長，躺在船頭，默默無語。

sentences.english: From then on we sat in silence, but we both know it and keep it alive.
sentences.chinese: 從那天起我們默坐無語，但是愛意永存。

sentences.english: Yang Shasha chat with you, I know what to say.
sentences.chinese: 跟你楊莎莎聊天，我竟無語。

sentences.english: He speaks in a cutesy voice on behalf of the dog.
sentences.chinese: 他尖着嗓子嬌滴滴的扮狗狗說話真是讓我無語了。

definition: to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
helpless/without choice/for lack of better option/grudgingly/willy-nilly/nolens volens/abbr. for 無可奈何|无可奈何[wu2 ke3 nai4 he2]
not to see/not to meet/to have disappeared/to be missing
to despise/to disdain/to look down upon
